<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_business_rules">

        <name>Push Background Request to Ext Interface</name>
        <order>100</order>

        <rest_method_text/>
        <rest_service/>
        <rest_service_text/>
        <rest_variables/>
        <role_conditions/>
        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
 
 // Check if exists

 // Add your code here
 var gr = new GlideRecord('sn_hr_integrations_external_interface');
 gr.addQuery("source_table_name", current.getTableName());
 gr.addQuery("source_table_sys_id", current.sys_id);
 gr.addQuery("process_type", "synchronous");
 gr.addEncodedQuery("statusINpending,work_in_progress");
 gr.query();
 if(gr.hasNext()){
  gs.info("Record already exists in External Interface in Pending/Work In Progress status");
  return;
 }
  
 
 gr.initialize();
 gr.setValue("source_table_name", current.getTableName());
 gr.setValue("source_table_sys_id", current.sys_id);
 gr.setValue("process_type", "synchronous");
 gr.setValue("status", "pending");
 var mapping = new GlideRecord("sn_hr_integrations_service_mapping");
 mapping.addActiveQuery();
 mapping.addQuery("hr_service", current.hr_service);
 mapping.query();
 mapping.next();
 gr.setValue("hr_integration_service_mapping",mapping.getValue("sys_id"));
 gr.insert();
 
 

})(current, previous);]]></script>
